title: Hi, Silver 3 support looking for any ranked 5's team.
body:
Im just looking for any team i can quickly join in as a support, im looking to improve on this role so joining a ranked 5's (gud or bad) will be a fun way to do it.

Add me in game if interested, Summoners Name: Muffinman

replies.body: sure add me  a bad ezreal :)
